text.div:
StructureMapListMode

If field is a list, how to manage the list

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/map-list-mode, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
only_one Only Oneif the input has more than one match, then the mapping fails with an error
first Firstthis is the first item in the target list. If more that one rule defines a first item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error
share Sharethe target instance is shared with the target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones)
